project_title: Predictive Maintenance Using Machine Learning for Industrial Equipment
description: Develop a predictive maintenance system that uses machine learning to forecast equipment failures, reducing downtime and maintenance costs.

checklist.task: Gather historical sensor data, operational logs, and maintenance records
Clean, normalize, and preprocess the data
Extract relevant features from raw sensor data
Create time-series features to capture trends and patterns
Implement supervised learning models for failure prediction
Explore unsupervised learning methods for anomaly detection
Develop time-series models for forecasting time-to-failure
Evaluate model performance using accuracy, precision, recall, and F1 score
Build a user-friendly dashboard for real-time monitoring and predictive analytics
Integrate the ML model with IoT sensors for real-time monitoring
Configure alerts and notifications for the maintenance team
Estimate potential cost savings from reduced downtime and maintenance
Measure improvements in equipment utilization and productivity
